meanings.sent1: She effectuates positive change in her community by volunteering regularly.
meanings.sent2: The new policy effectuates a more efficient workflow in the office.
meanings.sent3: The magician effectuates a rabbit out of his hat, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: His leadership effectuates a transformation in the company, turning it into a successful business.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight effectuates a beautiful rainbow after the rain, brightening up the sky.

meanings.sent1: Studying diligently effectuates good grades in school.
meanings.sent2: With hard work, she effectuates her dream of becoming a doctor.
meanings.sent3: The chef effectuates a delicious meal that leaves everyone satisfied.
meanings.sent4: His determination effectuates a remarkable recovery after the accident.
meanings.sent5: Practice effectuates perfection, so keep working towards your goals.
